entry.name: focusout
entry.title: .focusout()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "focusout" event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

div.p: Instead of .focusout( handler ) or .focusout( eventData, handler ), use .on( "focusout", handler ) or .on( "focusout", eventData, handler ), respectively.
